summary.title: About me
description:
A programming geek and experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the software industry.Experienced in Backend Development, implementing Micro services using Java, Python, Julia.Expert in data processing.Experienced in implementing web application end to end.Worked as R&D, Data Engineer, Software Development.
My Skill Set Matrix:Java, Spring Boot, Micro Services, Python, Flask, Django, Azure, C, C++, Assembly (emu 8086), Lex, Java SE, JDBC, Servlet, JSP, J2EE, Web services, Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring Security, Spring REST, Hibernate, JSoup, JSON org, Shell, VB Script, NLP, NLTK, Stanford Core Lib, Pandas, SQL, MySQL, MsSQL, Cassandra, HBase, Mongo DB, PostgreSQL,SQLAlchemy, Hadoop, Map Reduce, Spark, Scala, PySpark, HDFS, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Spark SQL, HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB, Kafka, Resilient Distributed Dataset RDD, Spark Core, Spark SQL, Spark Streaming, Spark ML Lib, Dash Framework, Apache airflow, AWS S3, Matplotlib, PyPlot, Plotly, Dev C++, MySQL, Oracle, Tomcat, Nginx, Gunicorn, Load Balancer, SoapUI, SQLPlus, SQLDeveloper, SBT, Anaconda3, Jupyter Notebook, Google Colab, Mac OS X, Linux, Cloudera, Windows, Fedora.

career.title: Career Objective
career.description: Eager to expand my skill set and a very enthusiastic learner and quick at adaption.</br></br></br></br>

companyList.name: Intellect Design Arena Ltd.
description: Designed database architecture for MLOps Experiment,Run and Model tables for Rest APIs.Implemented CRUD API for each using FastAPI framework.Which will be consumed by data science team to train and test the models from UI with APIs driven and can able to create,run and register the models by multiple organizations.Internally It is using the Google's Kubeflow and MLflow frameworks.

Designed a architecture for data processing.Implemented end to end product which supports the multiple organizations and multiple batches.Using apache airflow framework and Python3.It expands and shrinks based on data.N tasks distributes to N workers.Deployed it on Cloud Kubernetes.

companyList.name: CBRE South Asia Pvt Ltd.
description: Implemented a Java Microservices with Spring Boot for understanding the employees skill set matrix.
Implemented a Microservice APIs for Plans application using Julia language and dockerized it.Implemented a utility for logs sync and rotation.
Implemented a chatbot Microservice APIs and deployed it on cloud microsoft Azure App service.
Implemented a data migration utility,It copies the data from MsSQL/PostgreSQL source db, table to PostgreSQL/MsSQL target db, table.

companyList.name: Oracle India Pvt Ltd.
description: Oracle HCM Cloud(Oracle Integrated Cloud Applications),implemented a algorithm to understand the all producs process execution time when scheduled.Optimized the tasks to finish it quickly.
Oracle HCM Simple Report Generator, It's a web application simple report generator on top of HCM result generator.

Oracle HCM Data Utilities, Implemented a data scanning engine for all the products master/child and other columns info.Storing the data in memory for quick access on large data sets.Used PySpark Created temp tables in memory, Implemented data generation engine from rest APIs using java.Mapped the search result to UI.
Oracle HCM Click History, It’s a production logs analysis and graph generation to track the user flow activity.

companyList.name: ADP India Pvt Ltd.
description: Implemented a hybrid automation framework using Selenium/Java and introduced to QA in ADP.
Implemented a data processing pipeline for IRVP using big data technologies.
Worked on RSVP/IRVP web application to enhance the functionalities.

key_projects.title: Key Projects / Involvements
description: In Intellect, From the Organization received On the Spot Recognition Award,“In sincere appreciation, Dedication at work for developing the airflow dags which controlled the entire batch processing.This enhancement helped to achieve the mammoth task of processing 2000 files in 5 minutes.”
In CBRE, Received appreciations from Vice President, Head Digital & Technology, India.Developed the chatbot services.I had been invlovoing in organization level R&D POCs.
In Oracle, Optimized the Oracle HCM Data Utilities processing time,It used to take around 24 hrs to process all products data, After Optimization It was taking around 30 mins.
In ADP, Received appreciation award from Director,New jersey,US.Participated in hackathon, Developed Google assistant to obtain daily calendar and pay related info available with ADP.

certificates.title: Certificates and Awards
description: Visit my linkedin profile for latest coding/technologies certificates.
Developed a framework to automate IRVP(iProducts) for North America payroll in the short span of time.Appreciated by India VP-GPT(Global Business solutions) in ADP.
Developed a IRTS project at IIIT first convocation2016.Received Chancellors special appreciation award by Chancellor Raj Reddy, Honorable Chief Minister Mr. Chandrababu Naidu sir.
Acquired 2nd prize in ‘CODING and DECODING’ in SARVAGNYA 2K15 national level technical symposium at JNTU pulivendula.
Acquired mandal 1st rank in X th class year of 2010 and received pratibha award from government of andhra pradesh, india.
